languages.text: "Уличные лжепророки — типичное явление. Из их проповедей рождаются смуты, мятежи и акты непокорства. Инквизиция рекомендует изолировать таких нестабильных деятелей и конспиративно устранять".

"False prophets in the streets are a common occurrence. Their sermons breed turmoil, riots, and acts of disobedience. The Inquisition recommends that such unstable agents be isolated and quietly removed."
languages.original_text: "Уличные лжепророки — типичное явление. Из их проповедей рождаются смуты, мятежи и акты непокорства. Инквизиция рекомендует изолировать таких нестабильных деятелей и конспиративно устранять".

"False prophets in the streets are a common occurrence. Their sermons breed turmoil, riots, and acts of disobedience. The Inquisition recommends that such unstable agents be isolated and quietly removed."

languages.text: «Los falsos profetas callejeros son comunes. Sus sermones fomentan el descontento, las sublevaciones y la desobediencia. La Inquisición recomienda aislar y eliminar sigilosamente a estos elementos inestables».
languages.original_text: "False prophets in the streets are a common occurrence. Their sermons breed turmoil, riots, and acts of disobedience. The Inquisition recommends that such unstable agents be isolated and quietly removed."

traits.locale_text: «Los falsos profetas callejeros son comunes. Sus sermones fomentan el descontento, las sublevaciones y la desobediencia. La Inquisición recomienda aislar y eliminar sigilosamente a estos elementos inestables».

languages.text: « Les faux prophètes sont monnaie courante dans nos rues. Leurs sermons peuvent être source de sédition et d'actes de désobéissance, allant parfois jusqu'à l'émeute. L'Inquisition recommande que ces fauteurs de trouble soient rapidement isolés et réduits au silence en toute discrétion. »
languages.original_text: "False prophets in the streets are a common occurrence. Their sermons breed turmoil, riots, and acts of disobedience. The Inquisition recommends that such unstable agents be isolated and quietly removed."

traits.locale_text: « Les faux prophètes sont monnaie courante dans nos rues. Leurs sermons peuvent être source de sédition et d'actes de désobéissance, allant parfois jusqu'à l'émeute. L'Inquisition recommande que ces fauteurs de trouble soient rapidement isolés et réduits au silence en toute discrétion. »

languages.text: “这种坑蒙拐骗的假先知在街上很常见，他们的布道可能引发种种骚动、暴乱和不满。审判庭建议立刻把他们带走，悄悄消灭这些不稳定的因素。”
languages.original_text: "False prophets in the streets are a common occurrence. Their sermons breed turmoil, riots, and acts of disobedience. The Inquisition recommends that such unstable agents be isolated and quietly removed."

traits.locale_text: “这种坑蒙拐骗的假先知在街上很常见，他们的布道可能引发种种骚动、暴乱和不满。审判庭建议立刻把他们带走，悄悄消灭这些不稳定的因素。”

languages.text: 「街頭で偽預言者が日常的に現れるようになっています。彼らの説教は混乱、暴動、不服従の行為を生みます。異端審問庁は、このような不安定な工作員を隔離し、静かに排除するよう勧告しています」
languages.original_text: "False prophets in the streets are a common occurrence. Their sermons breed turmoil, riots, and acts of disobedience. The Inquisition recommends that such unstable agents be isolated and quietly removed."

traits.locale_text: 「街頭で偽預言者が日常的に現れるようになっています。彼らの説教は混乱、暴動、不服従の行為を生みます。異端審問庁は、このような不安定な工作員を隔離し、静かに排除するよう勧告しています」

languages.text: "Falsche Propheten auf der Straße sind keine Seltenheit. Ihre Predigten führen zu Unruhe, Aufstand und Ungehorsam. Die Inquisition rät dringend dazu, solch instabile Agenten zu isolieren und unauffällig zu entfernen."
languages.original_text: "False prophets in the streets are a common occurrence. Their sermons breed turmoil, riots, and acts of disobedience. The Inquisition recommends that such unstable agents be isolated and quietly removed."

traits.locale_text: "Falsche Propheten auf der Straße sind keine Seltenheit. Ihre Predigten führen zu Unruhe, Aufstand und Ungehorsam. Die Inquisition rät dringend dazu, solch instabile Agenten zu isolieren und unauffällig zu entfernen."

languages.text: "Sokaklarda sahte peygamberlerin gezmesi, sıklıkla yaşanan bir hadisedir. Vaazları kargaşaya, başkaldırıya ve itaatsiz davranışlara yol açar. Engizisyon, böylesine dengesiz bireylerin izole edilip sessizce ortadan kaldırılmasını önerir."
languages.original_text: "False prophets in the streets are a common occurrence. Their sermons breed turmoil, riots, and acts of disobedience. The Inquisition recommends that such unstable agents be isolated and quietly removed."
